notes:
For a “guard‐dog meets attack‐dog” Soldier 76, you want a power that both anchors you defensively and lets you still keep up the pressure. My pick for **Round 1** is:

# Power

 [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) 
• Biotic Field follows you and grants you +20% max Health while active. → That extra health buffer and mobile heal zone means you can plant your field aggressively or peel for flanks—true guard-dog utility—while still staying in the fight.

## Item Pair (pick two – budget only lets you afford two):

1.  [Field Rations](item_46ae6709-1166-426f-bca3-97a538d3f089)  (Green Survival)
• “While on objective, restore 8 Life every second.”
– Synergy: On-Me ups your max health so each tick heals you for more. You become extremely hard to peel off point.

2.  [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418)  (Green Survival)
• “+5% Move Speed; enemies below 30% life are revealed to you.”

– Synergy: The speed boost lets you chase or reposition inside your Biotic Field. Revealing low-health foes turns you into a cleanup machine—attack-dog style.

Optionally swap one of those for First Aid Kit if you’d rather:

•  [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da)  (Green Survival)
• “+25 Shields; reduce regen delay by 33%.”

– Trade-off: You gain an immediate shield buffer and faster passive regen, but you lose the point-holding punch of  [Field Rations](item_46ae6709-1166-426f-bca3-97a538d3f089) .

For Round 2 you’ve got room for two mid-game greens/blues that lean into both guard-dog sustain and attack-dog punch. My top call is:

1.  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)  (Blue Weapon)
• +10% Weapon Power & 5% Cooldown Reduction
– Feeds straight into your Pulse Rifle damage and brings your Helix Rockets back faster. More DPS + more peel when you need to burst away from flankers.

2.  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8) (Blue Weapon)
• +5% Weapon Power & 10% Weapon Lifesteal
– Every shot you land tops you up. Combined with On-Me’s extra HP/regen zone, you’ll find yourself shrugging off damage as you dish it out.

# Why this pair?

– Sustain Loop:  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8)  keeps you healthy in fights, so you’re less reliant on  [Field Rations](item_46ae6709-1166-426f-bca3-97a538d3f089)  ticks or  [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da)  triggers.

– Pressure & Peel:  [Icy Coolant]’s (item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)  CDR isn’t just for offense—faster Helix means you can disengage or secure kills before a dive lands.

– Synergy with  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) : Your boosted max-HP from Biotic Field gives each bit of lifesteal more punch, and that cooldown slice means you can heal or escape sooner.

# Alternative two-item sets if you want to tinker:

•  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)  +  [Pulse Converter](item_a93a8a8e-28d1-4b02-8d80-3234f9eea3dc)  for weapon power + ammo regen (never run dry).

•  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8)  +  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0)  for lifesteal + big burst of overhealth on ability use (extra safety net).

If you want to slot only one Round-2 purchase and recoup your gold by selling one of your Round-1 greens, here are two clean options:

1. Pick up  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)  (+10% Weapon Power, +5% CDR)
• **Why:** Biggest DPS bump and faster Helix cooldown to peel or finish low-HP targets.
• **What to Sell**: Heartbeat Sensor
– You lose the 5% move-speed and low-HP reveals, but selling it frees up exactly enough cash for  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) .
• **Net Effect**: You trade intel for raw damage and ability uptime—perfect if you’re focusing on those attack-dog bursts.

2. Pick up  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8)  (+5% Weapon Power, +10% Weapon Lifesteal)
• **Why**: Every shot restores health, which stacks with  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) ‘s bonus HP/regen—massive sustain spike.
• **What to Sell**:  [Field Rations](item_46ae6709-1166-426f-bca3-97a538d3f089) 
– You lose the on-point regen, but selling it funds  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8)  entirely.
• **Net Effect**: You swap passive objective healing for in-fight lifesteal, letting you stay in skirmishes longer and turn kills into more staying power.

# In both cases:

• **Sell** one **Round-1 green at the start of Round 2**.
• **Buy** your single **blue-tier item**.
• Play a few fights to “earn back” that gold via assists/kills—your new weapon power or lifesteal will accelerate bounties and eliminations.

Afterwards, you’ll still have:

•  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7)  (extra HP & mobile Biotic Field)
• One Round-1 green (either  [Field Rations](item_46ae6709-1166-426f-bca3-97a538d3f089)  or  [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418) )
• Your new Round-2 blue

This keeps your build tight and ensures you’re not under-farmed or under-equipped.

Round 3 is all about beefing up your sustain and uptime so you can keep “ [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) ” rolling while you stack weapon power with “ [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d) .” You only get two new slots, so here’s the ideal pair:

1.  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448)  (Weapon – Purple)
• +10 % Weapon Power & +10 % Cooldown Reduction
• After you use Biotic Field, gain +5 % Weapon Power for 3 s (stack up to 3×)
→ Synergy: Every time you plant your Field ( [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) ), you both heal and immediately supercharge your Pulse Rifle. That feeds straight into  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d) ’s stacking loop, letting you melt through targets faster.

2.  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0)  (Utility – Blue)
• +5 % Cooldown Reduction
• When you use Biotic Field, gain 25 HP Overhealth for 3 s
→ Synergy:  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7)  already boosts your max HP—this turns each Field into a mini “I’m not dying” shield, so you can stay in fights indefinitely and recast your Field faster.


# What you get:
– Sustain & peel from  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7)  +  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) ’s overheal
– Continuous DPS bursts via  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448)  stacks feeding  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d) 
– Shorter cooldowns on Biotic Field and Helix Rocket
– More uptime on your ult (stacking weapon power = faster charge)

If you’d rather store up ammo or raw attack speed instead of weapon-power bursts, you can swap  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0)  for  [Commander's Clip](item_ff7cad01-2065-4908-a2c1-3bdf1458c7a4)  (+10 % attack speed, +40 % max ammo, restore 10 % ammo on Field use) and still pair it with  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) . But for pure guard-dog meets attack-dog,  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448)  +  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0)  is the sweet spot.

Round 4 is where you prune out all your budget greens, double down on counter-play, and turbo-charge your ultimate build up. Here’s a tight two-item grab—and remember to sell any leftover greens (Field Rations, Heartbeat Sensor, First Aid Kit) before buying:

1.  [Multi-Tool](item_5ba8d94e-f2f3-44b7-8773-025fc6ed7c56)  (Blue Ability)
• +5% Ability Power, +10% Cooldown Reduction
→ Why: Faster Biotic Field + Helix Rocket cooldowns means more cycles of healing/damage, which directly speeds up ultimate charge.

2.  [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505)  (Purple Ability)
• +10% Ability Power; ability hits apply 30% healing reduction for 2 s
→ Why: Counters sustain comps—every Helix or Field pulse you land neuters enemy heals, letting you secure kills faster (more ult charge, more map control).


Step-by-Step:
• Use the Sell button to offload your last green(s).
• Buy Multi-Tool first so you start stacking CDR ASAP.
• Then slot in Cybervenom to cripple enemy self-healers.
• From here into Round 5 you’ll feel your Tac Visor and Chaingun stacking weapon power faster, and your Biotic Field uptime lets you stay in fights to farm ultimate.

# Sell Strategy

In Round 4 we can sell any of our blues that don't stack these items include:

- [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) 
- [ [Multi-Tool](item_5ba8d94e-f2f3-44b7-8773-025fc6ed7c56) 

# Optional Replacements 

•  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) 
– +10 % Weapon Power, +10 % Cooldown Reduction
– After using an ability, gain +5 % Weapon Power for 3 s (stack up to 3×)
→ Feeds directly into Chaingun stacks and lets you spam Helix quicker—your “attack dog” muzzle flash never stops.

•  [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) 
– +20 % Ability Power, +10 % Cooldown Reduction
– After spending your Ultimate Charge, gain 100 Overhealth for 3 s
→ Clutch overheal buffers every Tac Visor or Field plant, so your “guard dog” peel is stronger and you stay in fights longer A.

By swapping these in, you keep the same CDR + power profile as your blues but level up to stacked bursts and a big health cushion—to both chase kills and hold ground.

**Follow steps for more clear instructions**

1. Sell → any flat-buff Blues  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)  and  [Multi-Tool](item_5ba8d94e-f2f3-44b7-8773-025fc6ed7c56) (if you bought it already) 

2. Buy → Hardlight Accelerator (if not yet) and Iridescent Iris (Purple Ability)
Iridescent Iris: +20% AP, +10% CDR; after spending Ult, gain 100 OH for 3 s
– Clutch over-heal on Tac Visor + faster CDs = sustain + counter-play.

# Inventory for R4:
•  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) ,  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d) 
- 3 Purples  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) ,  [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) ,  [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) 
- 2 Blues  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8) and  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) 

Any item not listed here that you have sell ASAP.

# Round 5 – Purple Purge & Power Spike

- By Round 5 we shed every lingering Blue, lock in two Purples that supercharge our heals + bursts, and add  [Biotic Bullseye](item_94d800c1-0c78-4adb-bb06-87118d9a7b54)  as our Power for Round 5.

1.  [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce)  (Purple Ability)
• +40 % Ability Power
→ Why: Your On-Me! base heal and Biotic Field ticks skyrocket—solid guard-dog sustain for you and nearby allies.
2.  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429)  (Purple Weapon)
• +10 % Attack Speed, +10 % Ability Power
• After any ability, your next 3 weapon hits deal bonus damage = 3 % of target’s Max HP
→ Why: Every Field or Helix cast primes a mini-burst window—attack-dog damage that stacks  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d)  faster.


Step-by-Step
• Sell all your Blues ( [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) ,  [Multi-Tool](item_5ba8d94e-f2f3-44b7-8773-025fc6ed7c56) ,  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) , etc.).
• Slot Power #3 →  [Biotic Bullseye](item_94d800c1-0c78-4adb-bb06-87118d9a7b54)  so that crits in your Field extend it + refund ammo.
• Buy  [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce)  → immediately feel your Field heals and  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7)  numbers spike.
• Buy  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429)  → now every Field/Helix primes a guaranteed chunk, fueling  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d)  stacks.
• Keep your 3 Powers and  6-slot inventory pure Purples:

# Powers:  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) ,  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d) ,  [Biotic Bullseye](item_94d800c1-0c78-4adb-bb06-87118d9a7b54) 

# Items:  [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) ,  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) ,  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) , [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) .

👉 Next in Round 6 we’ll double-down on ability/CDR stacking with Hardlight Accelerator & Mark of the Kitsune to turn every cast into an onslaught of heals + punishing damage.

# Round 6 – Pre-Finale Check & Backup Setup

- By Round 6 we’re locking in our core Purples, pruning any leftover Blues, and slotting in fail-safes if things go sideways. Sell off all non-Purples before buying.

1.  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448)  (Purple Weapon)
• +10 % Weapon Power, +10 % Cooldown Reduction
• After any ability cast, gain +5 % Weapon Power for 3 s (stacks 3×)
→ Why: Every  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7)  Field or  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d)  shot immediately spikes your rifle damage and rips through targets faster—accelerating your  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d)  stacks and ult charge.
2.  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb)  (Purple Ability)
• +10 % Ability Power
• After ability use, your next hit or heal deals +25 flat
→ Why: Primes a guaranteed chunk on your next Helix Rocket or Pulse Rifle shot right after planting  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) —perfect for finishing low-HP foes or bolstering your own heals.


## Backups & Tweaks

• If burst divers still drop you too quick → swap  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb)  for  [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e)  (gain 100 OH after spending ult).
• If you need extra sustain over damage → sub in  [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505)  (apply healing reduction on abil damage) or keep  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429)  for flat bonus DPS windows.
• For clutch survival → consider a Legendary survival like  [Divine Intervention](item_b5148b7f-8529-4b1b-a90c-5d7cf13f8f0c)  or  [Overdrive Core](item_a2a8dba1-5f2f-4da1-9445-b08f49162121)  in a sixth slot.


## Step-by-Step

1. Hit **Sell** on every remaining **Blue/Green item**.
2. Buy  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448)  first to amp your DPS/CDR immediately.
3. Buy  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb)  second to lock in that guaranteed +25 chunk on every Field/Helix.
4. Ensure your Powers are still Slot 1  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7) , Slot 2  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d) , Slot 3  [Biotic Bullseye](item_94d800c1-0c78-4adb-bb06-87118d9a7b54) .
5. Check your final two slots—add a backup Purple or Legend if needed (see Backups above).

# Round 7 – The Knockout Round

This is it—the final form of your “Guard Dog meets Attack Dog” Soldier: 76. You’ve got your healing engine, your burst windows, and your Chaingun stacks. Now we go all-in on Ultimate uptime, 1vX dominance, and post-Visor survivability to close out the match.

---

1.  [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e)  (Purple Ability)

• +20% Ability Power, +10% Cooldown Reduction
• After spending your Ultimate, gain 100 Overhealth for 3 seconds.
→ Why: Every Biotic Bullseye or Tac Visor now gives you a clutch buffer to survive re-engage or finish the fight. It’s your “I’m not done yet” button.

---

2.  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b)  (Legendary Weapon)

• +25% Weapon Power
• Deal +10% damage to enemies below 30% Life
→ Why: This is your execution tool. When you’ve softened targets with Chaingun stacks or Helix, this guarantees the kill. Perfect for 1v1s or cleanup in 1vX.

---

## Step-by-Step

1. Sell any remaining Purples that don’t directly feed your ult loop or burst (e.g.,  [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505)  or  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) ).
2. Buy  [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e)  first—this gives you post-ult survivability and CDR to keep Field/Helix cycling.
3. Buy  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b)  second—this is your finisher. Every low-HP target becomes a guaranteed frag.
Final Power Loadout:
• Round 1: On-Me!
• Round 3: Chaingun
• Round 5: Biotic Bullseye
• Round 7: Optional 4th Power slot, consider  [Frontliners](item_20863047-0978-4bcd-b75f-499fac432ff0)  (Overhealth to allies on Field drop) or  [Cratered](item_5bb876bf-52b5-496c-a9ea-b68e72ed3be1)  (Helix Rocket damage boost).

## Final Build Summary

Slot-Item Name-Role	
1— [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) —Weapon Power + CDR stacking	
2— [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) —Massive Ability Power	
3— [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) —Burst after ability use	
4— [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) —Bonus damage after ability	
5— [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) —Post-ult Overhealth + CDR	
6— [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) —Execution damage finisher

## What This Build Does

• Guard-Dog: You’re healing, shielding, and peeling with  [On Me!](item_cd2a0247-bc79-4f0b-b9ee-d985e3f9a9a7)  and  [Biotic Bullseye](item_94d800c1-0c78-4adb-bb06-87118d9a7b54) .
• Attack-Dog: You’re bursting with Helix +  [Chaingun](item_311b58a8-4cdf-480a-ba7a-0b69e6b77e3d)  +  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) .
• Final Round: You’re unkillable post-ult, and every fight becomes a 1v1 you win or a 1vX you clean up.
